org.js4ms.io.channel

Interface DuplexChannel<MessageType>

  • Type Parameters:
    MessageType - The message object type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    MessageInput<MessageType>, MessageOutput<MessageType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UdpEndpoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UdpSocketEndpoint

    public interface DuplexChannel<MessageType>
extends MessageInput<MessageType>, MessageOutput<MessageType>
    Interface exposed by all duplex message channel objects. A duplex channel provides the means for both sending message to and receiving messages from a single endpoint.
    Author:
    Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageInput

      • Fields inherited from interface org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageOutput

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close(boolean isCloseAll)
      Closes this channel and optionally closes any channels wrapped or attached to this channel.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageInput

        receive

      • Methods inherited from interface org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageOutput

        send

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close(boolean isCloseAll)
           throws IOException
        Closes this channel and optionally closes any channels wrapped or attached to this channel.
        Parameters:
        isCloseAll - Indicates whether attached channels should also be closed.
        Throws:
        IOException - The close operation has failed.
